comment: Didn’t know you were actually here

Though my moms old cat who went missing (ancient thing) could catch baby bunnies, baby chipmunks, and even a squirrel or two
They eat out of the duck's feeder at home, and steal stuff on my aunt's farm.
Although, on my aunt's farm, there are 5 cats to keep the numbers doewn.
Two of which have refined their hunting to needle point.
And she’s drop them on the steps, or get caught with them, still alive
Ehh just like any creature trying to stay alive, they are going to invade into people's homes.
Have you ever read "The Amazing Maurice and his Educated Rodents"?
Honestly if you have rats getting into your home, you got some serious holes you need patched up.
Rats unfortunately live very short lives, my two boys just recently passed away, only a week apart from each other. only 2 and a half years old.

hampsters. They do their own laundry

tired, but yeah. most systems nominal.

Take that to em. You could probably even take em to court

not always, because the court case will put those who hired in the bad spotlight
